name: Armoured Commander
body: Single-player tank combat game based on the 1987 board game [Patton's Best](http://boardgamegeek.com/boardgame/4556/pattons-best). Programmed in Python and [libtcod](http://roguecentral.org/doryen/libtcod/).
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
